Name: Cafe Tapvreugd
Review Text:
We found this place because we needed to get away from the rain and it turned to be a nice bar in Amsterdam Centrum!
I would called a hidden gem, we have been there 3 times more and the bartender is always friendly, they have different kind of beers and fair prices.

Name: Cafe Tapvreugd
Review Text: They didn’t have tap beer, only small Heiniken bottle, which was advertised on the board as 3€ (yes the bottle specifically) but then they charged 4€ (I guess because we were tourists) and they didn’t accept card, only cash.

Name: Cafe Tapvreugd
Review Text: Very bad service. The bartender sent 2 of my collegues out because they just accompanied me even though 90% of the tables inside were free.

Name: Cafe Tapvreugd
Review Text: Very cool Service and fair Cocktail price

Name: Cafe Tapvreugd
Review Text: The best place ever. Get a pint from Chantel unless they are closed.
